          • updateRepositoryState

            public void updateRepositoryState(String reportedVersion)
                           throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
            Follows this version logic:
            DB hostcomponent1 DB hostcomponentN DB desired New desired Repo State
            v1 v1 UNKNOWN v1 CURRENT
            v1 v2 UNKNOWN UNKNOWN OUT_OF_SYNC
            v1 v2 v2 v2 (no change) OUT_OF_SYNC
            v2 v2 v1 v1 (no change) OUT_OF_SYNC
            v2 v2 v2 v2 (no change) CURRENT
            Specified by:
            updateRepositoryState in interface ServiceComponent
            Throws:
            org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

          • getRepositoryState

            public RepositoryVersionState getRepositoryState()
            Specified by:
            getRepositoryState in interface ServiceComponent
            Returns:
            the repository state for the desired version
